attributes.action: Schools open later in the day at 10am
attributes.additional_details: I really think this could benefit hundreds and thousands. This is because students will be entitled to an environment where they can feel very happy and ready to learn by their energetic level. I feel this will boost the effectiveness of students’ learning. I believe in the quote, “quality over quantity.” Quality being the effectiveness of students. And quantity being the amount of time students use learning at school. I rest my case hoping you consider and accept my proposal of a plan.
attributes.background: I want the government to start schools at 10am so children don’t come to school hating their life, stressed, and drained of energy.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/612113
